parameter.name: yandex_token
parameter.label: Yandex Token
parameter.description:
Yandex token to access the device.
How to get Yandex token?

    Option 1:
  • 1. Follow this link https://music-yandex-bot.ru and enter your login and password of Yandex.
  • 2. The button "Go to the bot" will appear, do not click it, but copy the link
  • 3. Inside the link, all letters-numbers after &start= are the token
    • Other options described here: https://github.com/MarshalX/yandex-music-api/discussions/513#discussioncomment-2729781
